xhochy commented on pull request #3832: ARROW-4645: [C++/Packaging] Ship Gandiva with OSX and Windows wheels
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3832#discussion_r268718648
 
 

 ##########
 File path: dev/tasks/python-wheels/travis.osx.yml
 ##########
 @@ -41,7 +41,7 @@ before_install:
   - brew uninstall boost cgal postgis sfcgal
   - brew update
   - brew upgrade cmake
-  - brew install bison flex
+  - brew install bison flex llvm@7
 
 Review comment:
   Does this link to the static libs then? We should not depend on `brew` packages being installed.
